sys_script_include.description:
Tools to support (scoped) app development Functions are only available for global scope and specific scopes defined in the system properties "now.globaltools.access_from_scope" or "now.globaltools.access_from_scope_custom" for security reasons.
Please note that GlideController is not an offically supported API and thus use should be restricted.
sys_script_include.name: GlobalToolsCache
